description: This is a market on predictions regarding who Donald Trump will nominate for Secretary of Homeland Security.

markets.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Trump nominates Person A for US Secretary of Homeland Security by June 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market may be updated in the future to replace Person A with one of the potential nominees.

This market will resolve based on Trump's first nomination for this position - if Trump nominates another person to this position first, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.
markets.question: Will Trump nominate Person A for Homeland Security Secretary?
